job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Kforce has a client in Beaverton, OR that is seeking a Site Reliability Engineer. As a Site Reliability Engineer in the Retail and Athlete Tools team, you will be passionate about maximum availability, observability, reliability, security, and performance of the company's Digital Experiences in Stores and in our Digital call centers around the globe. The Site Reliability Engineer will build applications, tools, and automation using technical skills to provide deep problem analysis, detect system faults or code defects, define, report, write and build observability processes for critical metrics, and partner up with product delivery teams to provide long term scalable solutions to production issues. Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.  Salary: Competitive
